text:
Special teams formed

The Superintendent of Police, Saroj Kumar, said that two special teams had been constituted to arrest those who committed a major robbery at Kuppitchipalayam on Sunday.

Five masked men robbed Karuppasamy, a rice mill owner and farmer, his wife and son, of their luxury car, jewellery weighing about 200 gm, a mobile phone, and Rs. 2 lakh.

The car in which the accused came was found to be stolen.
title: Two special teams formed to crack robbery
